mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_free_board (free_board_num, free_board_title, free_board_cont, free_board_writer, user_id) VALUES(SEQ_BOARD.NEXTVAL, #{free_board_title},#{free_board_cont}, #{free_board_writer}, #{user_id})
mapper.select: SELECT FREE_BOARD_NUM, FREE_BOARD_TITLE, FREE_BOARD_CONT, FREE_BOARD_WRITER, FREE_BOARD_DATE, FREE_BOARD_HITS FROM tb_free_board WHERE FREE_BOARD_NUM = #{FREE_BOARD_NUM}

SELECT FREE_BOARD_NUM, FREE_BOARD_TITLE, FREE_BOARD_CONT, FREE_BOARD_WRITER, FREE_BOARD_DATE, FREE_BOARD_HITS FROM tb_free_board WHERE FREE_BOARD_NUM > 0 ORDER BY FREE_BOARD_NUM DESC, FREE_BOARD_DATE DESC

SELECT FREE_BOARD_NUM, FREE_BOARD_TITLE, FREE_BOARD_CONT, FREE_BOARD_WRITER, FREE_BOARD_DATE, FREE_BOARD_HITS FROM (SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(tb_free_board pk_board)*/ rownum rn, FREE_BOARD_NUM, FREE_BOARD_TITLE, FREE_BOARD_CONT, FREE_BOARD_WRITER, FREE_BOARD_DATE, FREE_BOARD_HITS FROM tb_free_board WHERE rownum <= #{page} * #{perPageNum} AND FREE_BOARD_NUM > 0 ) WHERE rn > (#{page} -1) * #{perPageNum}

SELECT FREE_BOARD_NUM, FREE_BOARD_TITLE, FREE_BOARD_CONT, FREE_BOARD_WRITER, FREE_BOARD_DATE, FREE_BOARD_HITS FROM (SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(tb_free_board pk_board)*/ rownum rn, FREE_BOARD_NUM, FREE_BOARD_TITLE, FREE_BOARD_CONT, FREE_BOARD_WRITER, FREE_BOARD_DATE, FREE_BOARD_HITS FROM tb_free_board WHERE rownum <= #{page} * #{perPageNum} AND FREE_BOARD_NUM > 0 ) WHERE rn > (#{page} -1) * #{perPageNum}
SELECT count(FREE_BOARD_NUM) FROM tb_free_board WHERE FREE_BOARD_NUM > 0

SELECT count(FREE_BOARD_NUM) FROM tb_free_board
AND FREE_BOARD_NUM > 0
